phrases: Ah...
Oh.
I do not have any more magic.
I cannot leave you... or the others.
Hm?
Well, uh, I am sorry, Shihoru.
I did not mean to make you talk about all that.
Huh?
Ranta apologized!
I wonder if it will rain tomorrow.
Wait, no.
It might snow tomorrow.
Yeah.
Before we do...
Merry, I want to talk to you.
We used to have a Priest named Manato in our party.
We used to have a Priest named Manato in our party.
And Manato got us together and made us into a party.
And I, uh, I do feel kind of bad about making a big deal when I get a small cut.
Oh.
Then, do you want to have dinner with us?
Hey little goblin slayers!
You heading to Damuro today, too?
What?
Once in a blue moon, there are moments when I automatically know exactly where to hit.
Manato, I am not worried or overexcited or anything.
Sorry!
Sorry, I
Heal Michiki, hurry!
Merry, hurry!
Merry!
I am sorry, Hayashi...
I have used up all my magic...
I am sorry.
I am sorry!
Michiki!
Michiki...!
Go!
Get away!
No!
I cannot do this!
Please, Hayashi!
I cannot leave you...
I said, go!
Let go!
No!
Michiki!
No!
Alrighty, then.
No!
I do not remember how we got back above ground.
Maybe my body remembered the way back.
Shinohara took us in, and we joined Orion, but Merry left soon after.
It was painful for her to be with me.
She did not say that, but I could see it in her eyes.
When she saw me, she saw a past she could not regain.
She could not help seeing it.
And that was painful.
After that, Merry moved from party to party, never staying long.
From what other people say about her, she is not the same as she used to be.
I am pretty sure I brought Merry back above ground.
But I wonder if that is... really true.
Right now, she is an empty she will.
She might have... left herself down there.
Please, help her.
Ah, well...
I understand the pain of losing a comrade.
I have experienced it, too.
Please do not forget that pain.
You will move forward while holding on to that pain.
Please treasure the comrades you have now.
Once they are gone, they will not return.
Usually, you do not realize this... until afterwards.
Repeating a yesterday filled with scrapes,
We clear the path to a hopeful tomorrow.
I wonder what remains
in both these tiny hands?
The voice I raised upwards scattered into the air.
The reality I have gamed is hazy,
and even if I cannot see ahead of me,
I can keep moving forward on this long road
if I am with you.
Connecting a bond covered in dust,
We join back to back in the past and future.
Repeating an answer full of mistakes,
I will reach out my hands to seek the light, again and again.
Tch, that was completely useless.
What was useless?
So now we know her past.
So what?
It does not have anything to do with us.
I guess...
We have to be nice to her just because she is had a rough past?
You have got to be kidding.
I did not say that.
That is what you are saying, Haruhiro.
How is she any different from us?
Are you saying we have not had a rough past?
Is it all our fault?
Well...
Why do we have to be okay being friends with someone who will not treat us as friends?
Shihoru?
I do not think... anyone here... was unaffected... when we lost Manato-kun... everybody was...
But to make up for it, I think we should try to be nice to her.
It would be nice if we could... and if she could, too...
Ranta, you said that she is no different from us, right?
So what?
So if we do not try to get to know her, she will not try to get to know us either.
If we do not treat Merry as a friend, she will not treat us as her friends either, right?
Then are you trying to get to know me, Haruhiro?
Are not you guys always ignoring my thoughts and opinions?
You know, Ranta, you always say unnecessary things.
What the heck?
Actually, you only say unnecessary things.
What are you trying to say?!
Like when you call me flat-chested, it hurts my feelings.
It is those things that are unnecessary.
Oh!
Mo-Moguzo?!
Is that how you have been feeling, Ranta?
I did not know.
It is not only Merry that I have not been paying attention to.
So that is how it is, huh.
What?
Sorry, Ranta.
Ah?
My bad.
I will be more careful from now on.
Yeah, because I think of you as a friend.
Wh-What?
Th-Then you better be careful, idiot.
That was unnecessary.
What is wrong with ailing an idiot, idiot?
Idiot!
Ranta?
Shut up.
At least give me time to think.
You?
Think about it?
Why you
Anyway, we will be seeing her tomorrow, so I need to think about how to face her.
Well...
You know, Shihoru...
I am sorry.
I did not mean to make you talk about all that.
Eh?
Woah.
I wonder if it will rain tomorrow...
You say useless things, too!
No, wrong.
It might snow tomorrow.
Yeah, I think that sounds like the right saying.
Moguzo!
It is true, though.
I am not sure how all of us will face Merry tomorrow.
It really is raining.
What did you say, Haru?
Oh, I was just saying that it is actually raining.
Yeah, it is raining.
Haru-kun, that dagger...
Yeah.
That is the one I dropped.
Sorry, Yume.
I have not been myself today.
But I am okay now.
Let us follow him.
We might find their hideout.
There were not any goblins that were good targets.
Okay.
Let us go back, then.
The rain does not help either.
But before that, Merry...
I want to talk to you.
Right now?
Make it fast.
Before you say anything, if you want me to leave the party, just say that.
Sorry, Merry, that is not it.
Now that I think about it we have been acting strange today.
After hearing her story yesterday, we do not know how to treat her anymore.
I do not know how to talk to her.
Merry felt that something was off and probably prepared herself...
For example, for a parting.
For an end.
Merry, I want to tell you something.
We used to have a Priest in our party.
His name was Manato.
We used to have a Priest in our party.
His name was Manato.
Manato died.
It is probably more accurate to say we let him die.
Manato healed us, even when we only had scratches.
He and Moguzo were also our shields during battle.
And he was also our leader, so he was basically doing three jobs.
I thought he was really amazing.
But before we knew it, we took that for granted.
I do not think it was easy for Manato.
He did not show it on the outside.
I did not even try to imagine how he was feeling.
But now, all I can do is imagine how he was feeling.
Manato is dead, so he is not here anymore.
When Manato died, I seriously thought that was it for us.
But if we want to keep living, we cannot just do nothing, right?
So that is why I asked you to join.
Because we cannot do anything without a Priest.
That was the only reason.
There was not any other reason.
But you see, we were originally just the ones left over that nobody picked.
And Manato got us together.
And made us into a party.
And we became friends.
Yeah, we have become friends.
When you are in the same party,
there will be times when things do not go smoothly, when you get angry, and when you fight.
But, they really are your precious friends.
It does not matter why you became friends, but that you are friends at this moment.
And I also think of you as a friend, Merry.
I-I also think of you as a friend.
Me too.
And you are super cute, too.
I-It is reassuring to have you here, Merry.
And I, you know...
I do feel kind of bad about making a big deal when I get a small cut.
Well, we are friends, right?
Looks like it is about to snow.
Even Ranta is apologizing.
That joke's getting old!
Merry.
Uh, if you want... you want to come with us to get Moguzo a helmet?
I am sorry.
I see.
Then, if it is okay with you...
Sorry...
Not yet?
Thank you.
See you tomorrow.
See you tomorrow.
Yeah.
If you keep living, a new day will come tomorrow.
Thanks, everyone.
I am so glad we found a cute helmet.
And we somehow had enough money, too.
Ranta did not pitch in even one copper.
That discount I got was what I paid, idiot.
Because of Ranta's aggressive haggling, we got the price down from forty-two to eighteen silvers.
I feel like maybe we are slowly getting a little closer to Merry, too.
And once, everyday...
Hey, goblin slayers!
How is it going, goblin slayers?
You heading to Damuro today, too, little goblin slayers?
They are probably going to hunt all the goblins outta this place soon.
Those idiots need to shut it.
Do not respond to them.
It is true, anyway.
This soup is delicious.
Yup.
Maybe I will try making it, too.
Seriosly?
Yay!
If you are okay with something similar, yeah.
Day after day, it is goblins, goblins, goblins, goblins.
Rain or shine, it is goblins, goblins, goblins, goblins, goblins, goblins.
At first, they all looked the same, but recently, I have been able to tell them apart.
There are many males and few females.
According to Merry, most of the females are in Damuro's new city, surrounded by high level males.
I am not jealous of that harem.
Like the female goblins would fall for you.
Those that do not understand my charm are useless.
If you understand it, you know right away.
Merry, who would you choose from the three of us?
Eh?
No need to be shy.
What is there to be shy about?
Beats me.
Hey, hey, hey!
How is it going?
I really have not seen Merry smile before.
We make sure to have nutritious meals.
And it is fine to stay in the rundown Volunteer Soldier housing.
Even if we had the money to stay in nicer places, we should use that for equipment.
I especially want to invest in Moguzo's armor.
We definitely cannot afford anything custom made with sheet metal.
Instead, we bought a more affordable used one and had a blacksmith fit it.
Even so, the pieces all cost a couple silvers or more.
Then there are skills.
I learned Sneaking and Swat to mute my footsteps.
Shihoru's Sleepy Shadow is shadow magic that puts enemies to sleep.
Exhaust!
Avoid!
Ranta just likes shouting out his skill names.
Moguzo's War Cry paralyzes the enemy for a moment.
Yume learned Swift, raising her bow accuracy.
With Mouse Hole, she can also quickly dodge an enemy attack.
Merry's always been levels above us, so it is reassuring to have her.
Once in a while, there are moments when I automatically know exactly where to hit.
My blade easily slips through, and it is tip touches something.
As it touches, I know I have hit the right place.
Before I realize it, I have already pierced through.
I actually have no idea what this light is either.
I will ask Teacher Barbara next time I see her.
Is not it about time, Haruhiro?
Yeah.
Yup.
Finally!
Cannot sleep?
Yeah, kind of.
Kind of like how you cannot sleep the night before a field trip?
I do not know.
Manato...
That is good.
Yeah.
How many days have we been in Grimgar?
I do not remember when I stopped counting.
There is one thing for sure.
Wherever we came from, we are all friends now.
And we are definitely living our lives together here.
Manato...
I want to show you what our party is like now, too.
Manato...
See you tomorrow.
When I try touching
the dry air after a rain,
like a sprouting flower,
fragments of memories overflow.
The warmth you gave this hand
led me to a future I can treasure
always.
I chased your voice.
I wonder when you became so strong.
I will probably find what I searched the vast world for
at the end of this journey.
Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash
They Were Called Goblin Slayers
Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash
In My Memories with You
Also check out!
Goblin's
Journey
Now serialized on the official anime web site.
